alert.note: Alert for Louisa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:31PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Des Moines and southwestern Louisa Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Amber, or near Wapello, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wapello around 235 PM CDT. Amber around 240 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Morning Sun. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
